The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 21 September is 3,311 (383.2 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 17 September, there were 104 new confirmed cases (12.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 September, there were 148 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 30% (44 fewer cases).
